metadata.purpose: This file stores all sacrifice events where speed was chosen over depth. Per A7 (Sacrifice) and A2 (Memory), all trade-offs are explicitly noted and this log is append-only with no destructive overwrites.

sacrifice_event.task_id: string - ID of the task where sacrifice occurred
sacrifice_event.description: string - What simpler path was chosen
sacrifice_event.alternative_skipped: string - What more robust path was skipped
sacrifice_event.category: string - Type of sacrifice (SIMPLIFICATION, PERFORMANCE, SCOPE, etc.)
sacrifice_event.impact_assessment: string - Expected impact (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, UNKNOWN)
sacrifice_event.mitigation_plan: string (optional) - Plan for addressing this later
sacrifice_event.timestamp_utc: string - ISO timestamp of when sacrifice was recorded
sacrifice_event.acknowledged: boolean - Whether the sacrifice was a conscious choice
sacrifice_event.acknowledgment_note: string - Note explaining the deliberate nature of the choice

usage_notes: This log is append-only. Do not delete or modify existing entries.
When a sacrifice is made, add a new entry to the 'events' array.
This log exists per A7: 'Whenever the agent chooses a simpler/less robust path for speed, this must be explicitly noted as a sacrifice.'
